mapper.select: SELECT JID, TITLE, CONCAT(LEFT(CLOSE_DT, 4), '-', MID(CLOSE_DT, 5, 2), '-', RIGHT(CLOSE_DT, 2)) CLOSE_DT, LOCATION, COMPANY, EMPLOY_STATUS, CREATOR, CREATE_DT FROM TBL_JOB

SELECT A.JID, A.TITLE, CONCAT(LEFT(A.CLOSE_DT, 4), '-', MID(A.CLOSE_DT, 5, 2), '-', RIGHT(A.CLOSE_DT, 2)) CLOSE_DT, A.LOCATION, A.COMPANY, A.EMPLOY_STATUS, A.CREATOR, A.CREATE_DT, B.VOLUNTEER, B.GROUP_CONTENT, B.BUSINESS_CONTENT, B.SUPPORT_CONTENT, B.MUST_CONTENT, B.WORK_CONTENT FROM TBL_JOB A JOIN TBL_JOB_DETAIL B ON A.JID = B.JID WHERE A.JID = #{jid}
